description: Actual measured value from a source
Policy launch market event or milestone
Relationship between event and indicator (links via parent_id)
Specific regulatory directive or rule change
Can people reach services? Coverage devices accounts
Are people actively using? Transactions active users
Do services work? Success rates uptime
Can people afford it? Costs relative to income
Do people trust it? Complaints fraud
Value 0-100 representing a rate or proportion
Integer count of items transactions users
Difference between two percentages in percentage points
Company reports and data (Ethio Telecom Safaricom EthSwitch)
Central bank or government data (NBE NIDP)
Academic papers think tank reports (GSMA IMF World Bank)
Derived from other indicators in this dataset
Event directly causes change in indicator
Event causes change through intermediate mechanism
Event creates conditions for future change
Major impact greater than 15% change expected
Minor impact less than 5% change expected
Very small impact less than 1% change expected
Based on research from other countries
